articles.author: Meg Wingerter
articles.title: Boulder County resident exposed Flatiron Flyer passengers to measles - The Denver Post
articles.description: A Boulder County resident who recently traveled to Europe returned with measles, becoming the state’s 15th case this year.
articles.content: People who took the Regional Transportation District’s Flatiron Flyer between Boulder and Denver last week should watch for measles symptoms after a contagious Boulder County resident rode that route… [+2224 chars]
